fomod.Name: Milk Mod Economy
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Dialogue trade: *milk sold through dialogues is done through economy script, thus affecting economy and can yield more income
Khajiits merchants: -buy all milk -trade Lactacid for milk Orc merchants(wise woman): -buy normal and race milk Inns: -buy race milk alchemists: -buy ww/vampire/succubus milk -buy cum/semen -sell Lactacid for 100g/bottle -sell Breast enlargement potion for 1000g Fences: -buy all milk Farmers: -buy normal milk -sell Lactacid for 100g/bottle
Milk Pump locations: DawnStar Falkreath Markarth - outside of dibella's temple Orc strongholds (Features bound milkpumps, they wont let you(player) get out until you are milked dry) Riften - outside of mara's temple - Shor's stone Solitude - Dragon's bridge - Morthal Whiterun - behind the blacksmith - Riverwood - Rorikstead Windhelm - near the blacksmith - Winterhold Caravan - Ivarstead
Placing your own Milk Pumps: You can place Milk Pump anywhere you want, they might even affect economy. a) Using console: 1) help milk 2) get id of FURN Milk Pump 3) player.placeatme id from above 4) use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60910/]Jaxonz Positioner[/url] to adjust position
b) Using Campire mod to craft and place milkpumps
Dev change log:
v 08-04-2018 remembered to upload v 26-03-2018
v 26-03-2018 added pregnancy check through keywords for EC/ES/ED finally added what you all were waiting for, translation files for spells configuration page
v 21-03-2018 fixed Setunconscious() disabling player milking controls
v 19-03-2018 fixed armor not stripping when breast are full fixed incorrect futacum output after milking
v 17-03-2018-hf prevent lactacid activation to become milkmaid in combat and on mount fix for storymaker %text fix legacy mods that have no support for "MilkBarrel" added Setunconscious() to actors during mobile milking/ 1st lactacid use to avoid npcs moving while animating
v 17-03-2018 fixed milking not properly ending for actors with armors that cant be stripped(and probably naked) changed all(used to be only orc camps) bound milkpumps to produce only half milk for free lactacid changed cum addition to milked actor, rather than player added ability for modders to add milk to "MilkBarrel" objectreference after milking rather than actor
v 12-03-2018 added x10 lactacid trade dialogues for alchemists and farmers added option to disable scripts check if mod fails to start(ohh i'll probably gonna regret this)
v 09-03-2018 fixed broken dynamic storyteller script("name's breasts" errors etc ) changed milk generation conditions. To increase milk production you need to either drink lactacid or be pregnant and not have full breasts, milking and animations with "Breast" tag will also increase milk production you may use "MaidLevel Progression Affects MilkGen" toggle to increase production rate and slow down its drop rate when not pregnant or not on lactacid added condition to prevent armor(slot 32) stripping if it has sexlabnostrip keyword, that should probably fix issues with some DD items
v 18-02-2018 fixed mcm maid debug page
v 15-02-2018 added toggle to disable Exhaustion Debuff reduced Exhaustion Debuff strength 90%->50% reached mcm limit, time to add another mcm yay!
v 14-02-2018 added toggle to disable cum bottles production added toggle to disable animations play during mobile milking added SSE scaling patch for those who have ported mod to SSE, so body scaling works on old Netimmerse
v 15-01-2018 added description of fuckmachine toggle added toggle to disable 40% milk fullness requirement for mobile milking
